text: Rajko Kuzmanović (; born 1 December 1931) is a Bosnian Serb politician. He was President of the Republic of Srpska from 7 December 2007 to 15 November 2010.Official biography He replaced the Acting President Igor Radojičić. Kuzmanović won the election against Ognjen Tadić of the Serbian Democratic Party with 41.33% of the vote. ==References== Category:1931 births Category:Living people Category:Presidents of Republika Srpska
title: Rajko Kuzmanović
